title: Septimus – 70's swosh serif
content:
Any suggestions to a similar font?

Thx – Oystein

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [septimus\_70s.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235953/http:/typophile.com/files/septimus_70s.jpg) | 292.59 KB |

 [‹ Miss Brooks Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235953/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33179 "Go to previous forum topic") [don't know what font this is, please help! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235953/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33198 "Go to next forum topic")
author: oystein

comments.content: Sorry if I made you think I know the answer by my reply, but I just wanted to “tag” this thread in case the answer ever shows up (it’s a lovely font!) although my guess is that it’s probably custom.

I’d say it’s based on [Pretorian,](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235953/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/pretorian-dt/) but was probably drawn by hand.

- Lex

Looks like it Lex, thanks!

Oystein
